DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to test the hypothesis that rTMS on the dominant swallowing hemisphere is able to modify swallowing coordination.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Pharyngeal Inhibition by rTMS on Swallowing Function
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the study is to demonstrate that rTMS (on the dominant hemisphere, on the nondominant hemisphere and placebo rTMS) are able to modify swallowing coordination on healthy subjects. Swallowing function will be studied before and after rTMS with videomanometry.
DOC.criteria: 1850 years old healthy subjects epilepsia brain injury stroke pregnancy
